title: Ride straight Kate
creator_credit: Tony Mahood, Lynda House and Film Victoria
brief_description: Jason collides with a car while out riding his bicycle and is admitted to hospital. His friends decide to visit him and during their ride to and from the hospital they are confronted with several situations where accidents could occur because of their own or others’ carelessness. This program examines, in an interesting manner, safe cycling practices.
